div.p:
The Warrensburg R-VI School District wants to welcome you to our brand new web space. This new school portal provides easy access for our Students, Parents, and Staff to district resources.
To find teacher websites, please use the Select a School drop-down menu in the upper left, then click on the Staff Directory (or Staff Webpages) tab.
We look forward to seeing this space become your main resource for information. The Warrensburg R-VI School District serves 3500+ students in central Missouri from Pre-K to Adult Learners with approximately 500 staff.

div.div: 201 South Holden Street, Warrensburg, MO 64093 | Phone 660-747-7823 | Fax 660-747-9615
